tool_description: Ranks and optimizes multiple schedule options based on student preferences, commute patterns, and academic priorities.

schedule_ids.description: List of schedule identifiers to optimize and rank

optimization_criteria.description: Criteria for ranking: time_efficiency, professor_ratings, workload_distribution, commute_friendly

commute_preference.description: Commute optimization: minimize_days, minimize_gaps, or balanced

work_schedule_conflicts.description: Time slots unavailable due to work (format: 'monday_9am-5pm')

error_messages: Invalid schedule IDs: One or more schedules not found
Invalid optimization criteria: Use time_efficiency, professor_ratings, workload_distribution, or commute_friendly
Invalid commute preference: Use minimize_days, minimize_gaps, or balanced
Invalid work schedule format: Use format like 'monday_9am-5pm'
Insufficient schedules: Provide at least 2 schedules to optimize
usage: Provide schedule IDs, optimization criteria, and preferences to get ranked schedule recommendations with detailed analysis.

ranked_schedule_ids.description: Schedule IDs ranked from best to worst

optimization_scores.description: Overall optimization score (0-1) for each schedule

ranking_rationale.description: Explanation of why each schedule ranked as it did
